sentences.sContent: Moving to a new house is a very stressful experience.
sentences.sCn: 搬新家是件很劳心的事。

sentences.sContent: ...I find the in-class ones are more stressful in the short term...
...we're engaged in the stressful work of trying to get online...
...The most stressful thing about blue-collar life is knowing your job could disappear overnight...
...W: What do you enjoy about the stressful aspects of your job...

words.tran: 压力；强调；紧张；重要性；重读
强调；使紧张；加压力于；用重音读

trans.tranCn: 充满著压力的，充满著紧张的
trans.tranOther: a job, experience, or situation that is stressful makes you worry a lot
